Sure, I can definitely help you come up with a title for the promo video and some ideas for how to combine the footage of Hitarth Parikh and Saina Nehwal. Here are some suggestions:

Title Ideas:

* "Helios: Revolutionizing Sports Training and Rehabilitation"
* "Transform Your Game with Hyperlab's Helios"
* "Elevate Your Performance with Helios from Hyperlab"
* "The Future of Sports Training is Here: Helios by Hyperlab"
* "Unleash Your Athletic Potential with Helios by Hyperlab"

As for the video itself, you could start by introducing Hyperlab and their mission to develop cutting-edge sports tech products. Then, you could showcase the Helios product and explain its features and benefits, highlighting how it can be used to improve skills and techniques for a variety of sports, including badminton. You could also include footage of Hitarth Parikh explaining the product to Saina Nehwal, as well as her endorsement and gifting of the product, to showcase its potential and appeal. Finally, you could close the video with a call-to-action to encourage viewers to learn more about Helios and how it can help them elevate their performance.
